instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A2179 SSD problem?
threads.message: I got problem whit osx instalation, can't erase disc. Macbook turn on but there is apple logo and it turn off and again the same- apple logo- turn off, i can use osx instalation but when i choice whitch osx i want to instal mac turn off. I connect him in external drive mode , i see the disc in disc utility but can't erase it - nothing happening. Cant get to dfu mode too. main board number - 820-01958-A

threads.title: A2179 SSD problem?
threads.message:
Be sure to follow all steps from DFU tutorial.
This machine should go into DFU...
